comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@packtpartner**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Our learning resources are meant to be technology agnostic, so adding an Exchange management book doesn't make sense to me.
